title: returns
extract: If you change your mind on an item, you can return it for an exchange or refund. Items must be returned within 30 days. You must have your tax invoice. The item must meet the following conditions: Be in a saleable condition.
extract_html: If you change your mind on an item, you can return it for an exchange or refund. Items must be returned within 30 days. You must have your tax invoice. The item must meet the following conditions: Be in a saleable condition.
